Other Typealiases.html#/s:5Medea9JSONArr.name: JSONArray
Other Typealiases.html#/s:5Medea9JSONArr.abstract: Simple type alias for [Any], which is what JSONSerialization returns when decoding a JSON array.

Other Typealiases.html#/s:5Medea10JSONOb.name: JSONObject
Other Typealiases.html#/s:5Medea10JSONOb.abstract: Simple type alias for [String: Any], which is the closest Swift type to JSONSerialization‘s representation of a JSON object.

Enums/StringError.html#/s:FO5Medea11Stri.name: encoding
Enums/StringError.html#/s:FO5Medea11Stri.abstract: Thrown when JSON decodes into a string that is not UTF-8. This should be impossible.

Enums/JSONError.html#/s:FO5Medea9JSONErr.name: nonObject
Enums/JSONError.html#/s:FO5Medea9JSONErr.abstract: Thrown when expecting to convert to or from a JSONObject but a JSONArray is encountered instead.

Enums/JSONError.html#/s:FO5Medea9JSONErr.name: nonArray
Enums/JSONError.html#/s:FO5Medea9JSONErr.abstract: Thrown when expecting to convert to or from a JSONArray but a JSONObject is encountered instead.

Enums/JSONError.html#/s:FO5Medea9JSONErr.name: malformed
Enums/JSONError.html#/s:FO5Medea9JSONErr.abstract: Thrown when a string representation cannot be parsed as JSON.

Enums/JSONError.html#/s:FO5Medea9JSONErr.name: invalid
Enums/JSONError.html#/s:FO5Medea9JSONErr.abstract: Thrown when a JSONArray or JSONObject contains types that are illegal in JSON.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.name: jsonObject(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.abstract: Decodes Data representation of a JSON object into a JSONObject.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.name: jsonArray(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.abstract: Decodes Data representation of a JSON array into a JSONAbject.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.name: jsonObject(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.abstract: Parses String representation of a JSON object into a JSONObject.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.name: jsonArray(from:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.abstract: Parses String representation of a JSON array into a JSONArray.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.name: isValid(_:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.abstract: Validates whether the given String is well-formed JSON.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.name: isValid(_:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.abstract: Validates whether the given bytes represent well-formed JSON string.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.name: isValid(_:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.abstract: Validates whether the given JSONObject contains only valid JSON types.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.name: isValid(_:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.abstract: Validates whether the given JSONArray contains only valid JSON types.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.name: validate(_:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.abstract: Validates whether the given String is well-formed JSON, throwing if it’s not.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.name: validate(_:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.abstract: Validates whether the given bytes represent well-formed JSON string, throwing if they do not.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.name: validate(_:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.abstract: Validates whether the given JSONObject contains only valid JSON types, throwing if it does not.

Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.name: validate(_:)
Enums/JSONHelper.html#/s:ZFO5Medea10JSON.abstract: Validates whether the given JSONArray contains only valid JSON types, throwing if it does not.

Enums/JSONHelper.html.name: JSONHelper
Enums/JSONHelper.html.abstract: JSONHelper is a bag of functions for converting to and from JSON representations. It’s a very thin wrapper around JSONSerialization.

Other Enums.html.name: Other Enums
Other Enums.html.abstract: The following enums are available globally.

Other Typealiases.html.name: Other Typealiases
Other Typealiases.html.abstract: The following typealiases are available globally.
